decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to play aggressively by utilizing the energy mechanic while also taking advantage of strong creature cards. The deck aims to generate energy through cards like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit, which can then be used to power up cards like Bristling Hydra and Whirler Virtuoso. Control elements are also included with counterspells like Essence Scatter and removal spells like Abrade and Magma Spray. The mana base is built to support the multicolored cards in the deck, allowing for consistent and efficient casting of spells.

The main concept of this deck is to put intense pressure on the opponent's life total through aggressive creature attacks and direct damage spells. It focuses on quick, efficient creatures like Ahn-Crop Crasher, Bomat Courier, and Earthshaker Khenra, alongside powerful threats like Hazoret the Fervent and Kari Zev, Skyship Raider. The deck also includes burn spells like Abrade, Lightning Strike, and Shock to deal direct damage to the opponent or remove blockers. The inclusion of Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides additional value and card advantage. The deck is built around a mono-red mana base with some utility lands.

This deck focuses on using counterspells, removal, and card draw to control the game. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up its own win conditions with The Scarab God and Torrential Gearhulk. The deck uses a variety of removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt to deal with threats, while also utilizing cards like Glimmer of Genius and Search for Azcanta to draw cards and maintain card advantage. With a strong control game plan, this deck looks to outlast the opponent and win through powerful late-game threats.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by countering opponents' spells, removing threats from the board, and gaining card advantage. The deck uses a combination of counter spells like Disallow and Essence Scatter, removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt, and card draw spells like Glimmer of Genius and Hieroglyphic Illumination. The creatures in the deck, The Scarab God and Torrential Gearhulk, provide additional value by recurring spells and creating threats. The lands in the deck allow for fixing mana and disrupting opponents' decks with Field of Ruin.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up quickly with energy-generating creatures like Servant of the Conduit and Longtusk Cub, while also having access to removal spells like Abrade and Magma Spray to control the board. Chandra, Torch of Defiance and The Scarab God provide powerful late-game threats, and Whirler Virtuoso can create additional blockers or attackers as needed. By efficiently managing resources and maintaining pressure with aggressive creatures like Bristling Hydra and Glorybringer, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through a combination of tempo and powerful finishers.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively attack the opponent with a high number of low cost creatures and burn spells, aiming to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. This strategy is supported by cards like Hazoret the Fervent and Ramunap Ruins, which provide additional damage and reach. The inclusion of cards like Ahn-Crop Crasher and Earthshaker Khenra help to push through damage and prevent the opponent from stabilizing. The combination of creatures and burn spells makes this deck a relentless and fast-paced aggro powerhouse.

This deck focuses on playing efficient creatures and using energy synergies to quickly build a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Bristling Hydra, Glorybringer, and Longtusk Cub, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Whirler Virtuoso provide additional value and flexibility in both card advantage and creature generation. The deck also includes removal spells like Magma Spray and Harnessed Lightning to disrupt the opponent's strategy and clear the way for your creatures to attack.

This deck focuses on using efficient cost cards to quickly build up a board presence and deal damage to the opponent. It includes powerful creatures like Bristling Hydra, Glorybringer, and Longtusk Cub to apply pressure, supported by cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and The Scarab God for versatility and card advantage. With a mix of removal spells like Abrade and Magma Spray, along with energy generation from cards like Servant of the Conduit, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with low-cost, efficient creatures and burn spells. By constantly applying pressure and utilizing efficient removal spells, the deck aims to reduce the opponent's life total to zero as quickly as possible. Cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Hazoret the Fervent provide additional reach and late-game power to close out the game. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistency in casting spells and utilizing the land-based damage from Ramunap Ruins and Sunscorched Desert.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and powerful spells to quickly finish the game. By utilizing mana ramp and energy generation, the deck aims to play threats early and maintain pressure throughout the game. With a mix of removal spells and counter magic, the deck can disrupt the opponent's game plan while pushing through with its aggressive creatures. The mana base is designed to provide consistency and flexibility in casting the spells needed to outpace the opponent and secure victory.

The main strategy of this Temur Aggro deck is to quickly develop a board presence with efficient creatures like Longtusk Cub, Servant of the Conduit, and Rogue Refiner, while generating energy to power up cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Bristling Hydra. The deck also includes removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Magma Spray to deal with opposing threats, along with counterspells like Essence Scatter to protect your own creatures. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent with aggressive plays and strong creatures like Glorybringer, ultimately aiming to close out the game quickly.

This deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether, allowing for powerful plays with cards such as Bristling Hydra and Glorybringer. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Longtusk Cub and Whirler Virtuoso, while also having removal options like Abrade and Harnessed Lightning to deal with threats. The deck also has some versatility with Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Aethersphere Harvester providing additional card advantage and lifegain.

The deck focuses on using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With cards like Torrential Gearhulk, The Scarab God, and Vraska's Contempt, the deck can out-value opponents in the late game. The inclusion of Search for Azcanta provides further card selection and late-game advantage. The deck also includes some hand disruption with Harsh Scrutiny to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the goal is to control the game through disruption and card advantage until the opponent is overwhelmed.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Soul-Scar Mage, Rigging Runner, and Bomat Courier, you can quickly establish a board presence. Earthshaker Khenra and Ahn-Crop Crasher provide additional pressure, while Hazoret the Fervent serves as a powerful finisher. The inclusion of burn spells like Shock, Abrade, and Lightning Strike ensure that you can remove any blockers or deal damage directly to the opponent. Ramunap Ruins and Sunscorched Desert provide additional reach to close out the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Disallow, Fatal Push, and Vraska's Contempt, this deck aims to neutralize threats from the opponent. The inclusion of The Scarab God and Torrential Gearhulk provides additional late-game power and recursion. Search for Azcanta and Hieroglyphic Illumination help dig for key cards, while Field of Ruin offers disruption for opponent's utilities. With a balanced mix of control elements and threats, this deck aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent.
